name: octas

scripts.browserify: concurrently "npm run browserify:index" "npm run browserify:local" "npm run browserify:worker"
scripts.browserify:index: browserify lib/index.js --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables ] | exorcist index.js.map > index.js
scripts.browserify:local: browserify lib/index-local.js --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables ] | exorcist index-local.js.map > index-local.js
scripts.browserify:worker: browserify lib/worker.js --debug --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] --plugins transform-inline-environment-variables ] | exorcist worker.js.map > worker.js
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run browserify" "npm run pug" "npm run less"

author: 東京大学理論科学グループ(Theoretical Science Group)
